entry.title: $2199 // GORGEOUS 2br Steps from L/M Trains w/ Laundry in bldg!
entry.content:
Renovated true 2 bedroom in a prime Bushwick location!

Apartment features stainless steel appliances, queen sized bedrooms with windows and ample closet space, and central heat/ac. Perfect for roommate privacy with bedrooms on opposite ends of the apartment. Room sizes respectively are 11.5' x 11'

Laundry and bike storage are in the basement. Shared roof deck for the building with views of Manhattan! Right around the corner from Food Bazaar, Starbucks, Planet Fitness, and many more local favorite coffee shops, restaurants and bars.

1 minute from Myrtle-Wyckoff L, M trains

--NO BROKER FEE--
Email, text, or call Dave to view!
